snippet: A daughter of Robert H. Schuller, founder of the Crystal Cathedral megachurch in California, said the family would cut ties with the beleaguered church after a financial dispute.
abstract: Family of Rev Robert H Schuller has decided to cut its ties with the beleaguered Crystal Cathedral megachurch that he founded in California, citing an ongoing financial dispute that has resulted in bankruptcy proceedings; announcement ends a stunning decline in fortunes for Schuller, who attracted more than 10,000 worshipers each week during his heyday in the 1980s.
lead_paragraph: A daughter of Robert H. Schuller, founder of the Crystal Cathedral megachurch in California, said the family would cut ties with the beleaguered church after a financial dispute.

headline.seo: Robert Schuller Family Cuts Ties to Crystal Cathedral
headline.main: Founding Family Decides to Leave Crystal Cathedral
headline.print_headline: Family Opts To Abandon Megachurch It Founded
